name: Void.io
description:
Void.io

is a Sci-Fi, Spacey, themed Arcade-Game in which the Player is greeted with a simple, yet fun, Game-Loop.

Inspired by Diep.io and the

many many brilliant Games at Itch.io.

Game Programming and Art: Haro.

Spelling and Orthography: Kiera.

Play-Testing: Mitch, Adrian & Kroam.
